panels.description: Current status of all bzfs jobs

targets.expr: bzfs_job_status{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

time() - bzfs_job_last_run_timestamp_seconds{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

bzfs_job_duration_seconds{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

panels.title: Current Job Status Overview

panels.description: Number of jobs by current status
panels.title: Jobs by Status

targets.expr: count(bzfs_job_status{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"} != 0) OR on() vector(0)

panels.description: Jobs that haven't run in over 24 hours

targets.expr: count((time() - bzfs_job_last_run_timestamp_seconds{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}) > 86400) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Stale Jobs (>24h)

targets.expr: count(bzfs_job_status{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"})

panels.description: Time since each job last ran successfully

targets.expr: time() - bzfs_job_last_run_timestamp_seconds{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

panels.title: Time Since Last Run

panels.description: Distribution of jobs by action type

targets.expr: count by (action) (bzfs_job_status{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"})

panels.title: Jobs by Action Type

panels.description:
Total data transferred per job
Getting -1 here means that pv is not installed and sent_bytes cannot be calculated properly

targets.expr: bzfs_bytes_sent_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

panels.title: Bytes Transferred

targets.expr: bzfs_throughput_bytes_per_second{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

panels.description: Number of snapshots replicated per job

targets.expr: bzfs_snapshots_replicated_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

panels.title: Snapshots Replicated

targets.expr: bzfs_snapshots_found_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

bzfs_job_duration_seconds{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

bzfs_cache_hits_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"} / (bzfs_cache_hits_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"} + bzfs_cache_misses_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"})

bzfs_cache_hits_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}

bzfs_cache_misses_total{tenant=~"$tenant", instance=~"$instance", job_id=~"$job_id", action=~"$action", src_dataset=~"$src_dataset", dst_dataset=~"$dst_dataset", src_host=~"$src_host", dst_host=~"$dst_host"}
